verses.verse: So king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> was king<WH4428> over all Israel<WH3478>.
And these were the princes<WH8269> which he had; Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, priest: or, chief officer

Elihoreph<WH456> and Ahiah<WH281>, the sons<WH1121> of Shisha<WH7894>, scribes<WH5608>; Jehoshaphat<WH3092> the son<WH1121> of Ahilud<WH286>, the recorder<WH2142>. scribes: or, secretaries recorder: or, remembrancer
And Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077> was over the host<WH6635>: and Zadok<WH6659> and Abiathar<WH54> were the priests<WH3548>:

And Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Nathan<WH5416> was over the officers<WH5324>: and Zabud<WH2071> the son<WH1121> of Nathan<WH5416> was principal officer<WH3548>, and the king's<WH4428> friend<WH7463>:
And Ahishar<WH301> was over the household<WH1004>: and Adoniram<WH141> the son<WH1121> of Abda<WH5653> was over the tribute<WH4522>. tribute: or, levy

And Solomon<WH8010> had twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> officers<WH5324> over all Israel<WH3478>, which provided victuals<WH3557> for the king<WH4428> and his household<WH1004>: each man<WH259> his month<WH2320> in a year<WH8141> made provision<WH3557>.
And these are their names<WH8034>: The son of Hur<WH1133>, in mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669>: The son: or, Benhur
The son of Dekar<WH1128> <WH1857>, in Makaz<WH4739>, and in Shaalbim<WH8169>, and Bethshemesh<WH1053>, and Elonbethhanan<WH358>: The son: or, Ben Dekar
The son of Hesed<WH1136> <WH2618>, in Aruboth<WH700>; to him pertained Sochoh<WH7755>, and all the land<WH776> of Hepher<WH2660>: The son: or, Ben Heseb
The son of Abinadab<WH1125>, in all the region<WH5299> of Dor<WH1756>; which had Taphath<WH2955> the daughter<WH1323> of Solomon<WH8010> to wife<WH802>: The son: or, Bena Binadab

Baana<WH1195> the son<WH1121> of Ahilud<WH286>; to him pertained Taanach<WH8590> and Megiddo<WH4023>, and all Bethshean<WH1052>, which is by<WH681> Zartanah<WH6891> beneath Jezreel<WH3157>, from Bethshean<WH1052> to Abelmeholah<WH65>, even unto the place that is beyond<WH5676> Jokneam<WH3361>:

The son of Geber<WH1127>, in Ramothgilead<WH1568> <WH7433>; to him pertained the towns<WH2333> of Jair<WH2971> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519>, which are in Gilead<WH1568>; to him also pertained the region<WH2256> of Argob<WH709>, which is in Bashan<WH1316>, threescore<WH8346> great<WH1419> cities<WH5892> with walls<WH2346> and brasen<WH5178> bars<WH1280>: The son: or, Ben Geber
Ahinadab<WH292> the son<WH1121> of Iddo<WH5714> had Mahanaim<WH4266>: Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim
Ahimaaz<WH290> was in Naphtali<WH5321>; he also took<WH3947> Basmath<WH1315> the daughter<WH1323> of Solomon<WH8010> to wife<WH802>:
Baanah<WH1195> the son<WH1121> of Hushai<WH2365> was in Asher<WH836> and in Aloth<WH1175>:
Jehoshaphat<WH3092> the son<WH1121> of Paruah<WH6515>, in Issachar<WH3485>:
Shimei<WH8096> the son<WH1121> of Elah<WH414>, in Benjamin<WH1144>:

Geber<WH1398> the son<WH1121> of Uri<WH221> was in the country<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568>, in the country<WH776> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, and of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>; and he was the only<WH259> officer<WH5333> which was in the land<WH776>.
Judah<WH3063> and Israel<WH3478> were many<WH7227>, as the sand<WH2344> which is by the sea<WH3220> in multitude<WH7230>, eating<WH398> and drinking<WH8354>, and making merry<WH8056>.

And Solomon<WH8010> reigned<WH4910> over all kingdoms<WH4467> from the river<WH5104> unto the land<WH776> of the Philistines<WH6430>, and unto the border<WH1366> of Egypt<WH4714>: they brought<WH5066> presents<WH4503>, and served<WH5647> Solomon<WH8010> all the days<WH3117> of his life<WH2416>.

And Solomon's<WH8010> provision<WH3899> for one<WH259> day<WH3117> was thirty<WH7970> measures<WH3734> of fine flour<WH5560>, and threescore<WH8346> measures<WH3734> of meal<WH7058>, provision: Heb. bread measures: Heb. cors

Ten<WH6235> fat<WH1277> oxen<WH1241>, and twenty<WH6242> oxen<WH1241> out of the pastures<WH7471>, and an hundred<WH3967> sheep<WH6629>, beside harts<WH354>, and roebucks<WH6643>, and fallowdeer<WH3180>, and fatted<WH75> fowl<WH1257>.

For he had dominion<WH7287> over all the region on this side<WH5676> the river<WH5104>, from Tiphsah<WH8607> even to Azzah<WH5804>, over all the kings<WH4428> on this side<WH5676> the river<WH5104>: and he had peace<WH7965> on all sides<WH5650> <WH5676> round about<WH5439> him.

And Judah<WH3063> and Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> safely<WH983>, every man<WH376> under his vine<WH1612> and under his fig tree<WH8384>, from Dan<WH1835> even to Beersheba<WH884>, all the days<WH3117> of Solomon<WH8010>. safely: Heb. confidently
And Solomon<WH8010> had forty<WH705> thousand<WH505> stalls<WH723> of horses<WH5483> for his chariots<WH4817>, and twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> thousand<WH505> horsemen<WH6571>.

And those officers<WH5324> provided victual<WH3557> for king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>, and for all that came<WH7131> unto king<WH4428> Solomon's<WH8010> table<WH7979>, every man<WH376> in his month<WH2320>: they lacked<WH5737> nothing<WH1697>.

Barley<WH8184> also and straw<WH8401> for the horses<WH5483> and dromedaries<WH7409> brought<WH935> they unto the place<WH4725> where the officers were, every man<WH376> according to his charge<WH4941>. dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts

And God<WH430> gave<WH5414> Solomon<WH8010> wisdom<WH2451> and understanding<WH8394> exceeding<WH3966> much<WH7235>, and largeness<WH7341> of heart<WH3820>, even as the sand<WH2344> that is on the sea<WH3220> shore<WH8193>.
And Solomon's<WH8010> wisdom<WH2451> excelled<WH7235> the wisdom<WH2451> of all the children<WH1121> of the east country<WH6924>, and all the wisdom<WH2451> of Egypt<WH4714>.

For he was wiser<WH2449> than all men<WH120>; than Ethan<WH387> the Ezrahite<WH250>, and Heman<WH1968>, and Chalcol<WH3633>, and Darda<WH1862>, the sons<WH1121> of Mahol<WH4235>: and his fame<WH8034> was in all nations<WH1471> round about<WH5439>.
And he spake<WH1696> three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> proverbs<WH4912>: and his songs<WH7892> were a thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568>.

And he spake<WH1696> of trees<WH6086>, from the cedar tree<WH730> that is in Lebanon<WH3844> even unto the hyssop<WH231> that springeth out<WH3318> of the wall<WH7023>: he spake<WH1696> also of beasts<WH929>, and of fowl<WH5775>, and of creeping things<WH7431>, and of fishes<WH1709>.
And there came<WH935> of all people<WH5971> to hear<WH8085> the wisdom<WH2451> of Solomon<WH8010>, from all kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776>, which had heard<WH8085> of his wisdom<WH2451>.
